channel.title: Transformer on LIU Yun-Chung
channel.description: Recent content in Transformer on LIU Yun-Chung

item.title: Machine Translation Using Transformer Based Models
item.description: One of the most recent breakthroughs in machine translation is the application of the transformer. Compared with the sequence-to-sequence model based on recurrent neural networks(RNN), the attention-based transformer model makes use of token-wise information which further enhances the machine translation results. In this post, I will walk through a project of comparing the performances and structure of RNN- and transformer-based and machine translation models. Please have a look!
